changeSet.author: richard
changeSet.comment: Record which tables are utf8mb4_general_ci before updating.
changeSet.sql: insert into utf8_general_pre_rspac2515 (select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_collation = 'utf8mb4_general_ci' and table_schema = (select database()));

changeSet.author: richard

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT if (TABLE_COLLATION='utf8mb4_general_ci',1,0) FROM information_schema.`TABLES` T where TABLE_name='AbstractUserOrGroupImpl_permissionStrings' and table_schema=(select database());

changeSet.comment: Force utf8mb4_unicode_ci collation for AbstractUserOrGroupImpl_permissionStrings if it is currently utf8mb4_general_ci
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE AbstractUserOrGroupImpl_permissionStrings convert to CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
